nodes.title: People's Republic of China
nodes.short_description: Mainland government's political, military, and economic pressure shapes Taiwan’s security and international space.

nodes.title: United States
nodes.short_description: Primary security partner, arms supplier, and technology regulator affecting Taiwan’s defense and semiconductor ecosyste…

nodes.title: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC)
nodes.short_description: World-leading foundry; anchor of Taiwan’s economy, jobs, and geopolitical leverage.

nodes.title: Semiconductor manufacturing
nodes.short_description: Core industry driving exports, GDP, employment, and strategic relevance for Taiwan.

nodes.title: Xi Jinping
nodes.short_description: Sets PRC policy toward Taiwan; central to military posture and reunification strategy.

nodes.title: Taiwan Relations Act (1979)
nodes.short_description: U.S. law underpinning Taiwan’s defense support, arms sales, and deterrence commitments.

nodes.title: PRC Anti-Secession Law (2005)
nodes.short_description: Authorizes non-peaceful means against Taiwanese independence moves; escalates deterrence and security risks.

nodes.title: U.S. semiconductor export controls on China (2022–)
nodes.short_description: Restrict advanced chip equipment and know-how; reshape Taiwan’s supply chains and market access.

nodes.title: Hon Hai Precision Industry (Foxconn)
nodes.short_description: Major employer and electronics manufacturer; influences Taiwan’s economy and cross-strait industrial exposure.

nodes.title: ASML Holding N.V.
nodes.short_description: Sole EUV supplier; tool access constrains Taiwan’s leading-edge chip production capabilities.

nodes.title: CHIPS and Science Act (2022)
nodes.short_description: U.S. incentives driving overseas fab investments; affects Taiwan’s talent, supply chain, and competitiveness.

nodes.title: 2022 Taiwan Strait military exercises after Pelosi visit
nodes.short_description: Large-scale PLA drills coercing Taiwan; normalized pressure on airspace, waters, and trade routes.

nodes.title: Japan
nodes.short_description: Key regional security partner and technology market; supports stability and semiconductor supply chains.
